title: SESSION RESULT detail page Â» CAR MODEL VARIANT
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to know with which CAR MODEL VARIANT a SESSION RESULT was achieved\
So I can compare it with other results of this car
description:
* The SESSION RESULT detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected CAR MODEL VARIANT.
* The CAR MODEL VARIANT is presented with its name and primary information.
* The CAR MODEL VARIANT contains a link to its detail page.
* The CAR MODEL VARIANT has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no CAR MODEL VARIANT connected to the SESSION RESULT then the section is not displayed at all.
